text_description:
La Tramontane welcomes you in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, in the heart of the Camargues area. It offers individually-decorated rooms leading to the outdoor swimming pool, the garden and the private pond.

Soundproofed and air-conditioned, the guest rooms all feature a television and Wi-Fi access. They are decorated in a typical Provencal style and feature a private terrace overlooking the garden and the swimming pool.

We will have the pleasure to serve you on your terrace, at sunset, an aperitif accompanied by tapas to satisfy your gluttony or your appetite.

Free private secured parking is available on site.
address: 94 Chemin Bas de Dromar, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Mas Des Salicornes is a countryside hotel just a 10-minute walk from the beach, in the heart of Provence. Each room features a terrace and guests can enjoy the outdoor pool. Free WiFi access is provided.

All of the guest rooms at the Mas Des Salicornes overlook the Provençal-style garden. They are equipped with a TV, safety deposit box and air conditioning. Ironing facilities are available at reception.

A continental breakfast is available and guests can enjoy an after-dinner drink in the bar.

Mas Des Salicornes can organise a range of activities, such as excursions by horse and carriage and evening entertainment.

Situated within a walking distance from the city centre of Les Saintes Maries De La Mer, the hotel is a 20-minute drive from the Camargue Regional Park. Arles is a 35-minute drive away.
address: 38 Chemin du Pont Blanc, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Set in the Camargue Regional Park, Abrivado is an air-conditioned hotel located beside the harbour in the town of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer. It is 50 metres from the beach and the surrounding shops. Free WiFi access is provided in the guest rooms.

A TV is included in the rooms, which feature a simple décor. 12 of the rooms offer a sea view and 6 of them also feature a private furnished terrace. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is offered every morning at the hotel Abrivado for an extra charge.

Low-cost public parking is available nearby, and you can visit Arles, located 40 km away. Montpellier Airport is 52 km from the hotel. Public parking is available nearby.
address: 2, Avenue Theodore Aubanel, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Located in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d’Azur region, Le Fangassier a hotel set in a Camargue-style building 600 metres from the beach in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer. It offers free WiFi access.

All the air-conditioned rooms at Le Fangassier feature a telephone and a flat-screen TV. A bathroom with a bath or shower is also provided. Some rooms have a private terrace or balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Le Fangassier.

Shops and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk.

This hotel is a 15-minute drive from Château d’Avignon and Arles is 37 km away.
address: 12, Route de Cacharel, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Situated 100 metres from sandy beaches and 200 metres from Eglise des Stes Maries in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, Hotel Les Palmiers En Camargue features free WiFi access.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms.

A buffet breakfast with both sweet and savoury options is served at the property.

You can engage in various activities, such as horse riding, windsurfing and cycling.

Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 53 km from the property. Public parking is available 50 metres away at no extra cost while private garage parking is available upon request for an extra charge.
address: 16 Rue Alphonse Daudet, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Located 50 metres from the beach, Le Dauphin Bleu faces the Mediterranean Sea and is 400 metres from the centre of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer's historic old town. The hotel offers free WiFi in the guest rooms.

All rooms are air-conditioned and have a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and some have sea views.

Situated in the Rhône delta, this hotel is just 700 metres from a fortified church dating from the Middle Ages. The local area also offers water sports such as windsurfing. Le Dauphin Bleu is 56.1km from Montpelier Airport.
address: 31 Avenue Gilbert Leroy, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Bleu Marine is just 150 metres from Mediterranean beaches and 300 metres from the centre of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer village. It features a fenced, outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers and free Wi-Fi.

Several rooms at Hotel Le Bleu Marine have a balcony with pool view. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

The buffet breakfast is served every morning. Many shops and restaurants are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Hot and cold drinks are available upon request.

There is a thalassotherapy centre just 100 metres from the hotel's door.

Hotel Le Bleu Marine is 40 km from Arles and 60 km from Montpellier. Free parking is available on site.
address: 15, Avenue du Docteur Cambon, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Featuring an outdoor pool, boules pitch and table tennis table, Mas de Calabrun is a hotel located on a private estate in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Camargue Regional Park. The beach is 8 minutes' drive away. It offers free WiFi.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature traditional Camargue décor, a flat-screen TV and a view of the garden or pool. There is a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer.

The Calabrun can also organise horse riding and jeep tours.

Free private parking is available on site and the hotel is an hour’s drive south of Nimes.
address: Route De Cacharel D 85A, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Set by a pond, Les Rizières is a hotel situated 2.8 km from Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer and 2.4 km from Pont De Gau Ornithological Park with its pink flamingos. All the rooms are situated at ground-level around a patio planted with trees.

Air-conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar feature in the rooms. Free WiFi internet access is available throughout the hotel.

Less than 10 km from Les Rizières is the Camargue National Park and the sea is just 2.8 km away.

Please note that a maximum of  1 pet is allowed per room.  Please note that the property can only allow pets with a maximum weight of 15 kilos. An extra charge may apply.
address: Route D'Arles, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Thalacap Camargue faces the beach in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 5 minutes' walk from the city centre. You will enjoy a seasonal outdoor seawater swimming pool as well as an indoor swimming pool, sauna and hammam all year round at no additional cost

All of the rooms at Thalacap Camargue have a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access and air conditioning.

The restaurant serves Mediterranean-style meals. Weather permitting, meals can be enjoyed on the terrace with a panoramic view of the sea.

In addition to the other relaxation facilities, guests have direct access to a Thalassotherapy centre, which provides a number of health and beauty treatments for an additional charge.

Arles is 37 km away. private parking is available on site for 10€/night.
address: Avenue du Dr Cambon, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
This air-conditioned hotel featuring a terrace is located on the beachfront in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 35 km from Arles. Free Wi-Fi access and an LCD TV are offered in the modern rooms.

Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some of the rooms have air conditioning, a terrace or a view of the sea.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Hotel Camille. You can also enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

Horse-riding and tennis are among the activities available in the local area. Free public parking is possible nearby and the property has a motorbike/bike garage that guests can use free of charge.
address: 13, Avenue de la plage, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace, L'auberge Camarguaise is situated 2 kms away from Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer. The property was recently renovated by the new owners Elodie and Benoît who are very appy to welcome you at L'auberge Camarguaise. The property offers free private parking and free WiFi throughout.

Every room includes a double bed a private terrace, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a bath or a shower.

There is a shared lounge and a bar at the property with different cocktails, West Indian rhums, and aperitif board with local products.

The area is popular for horse riding and cycling. The natural Camargue parc is located 2 kms away from the property.

The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 50 km from L'auberge Camarguaise.
address: Route D' Arles D570, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Hôtel Le Mirage is 100 metres from the beach and 200 metres from Sainte-Marie-de-la-Mer Marina. It offers a garden with lounge chairs. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The heated non-smoking rooms at Le Mirage feature a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a desk. A mosquito net and a private bathroom are also provided.

Guests can have a continental breakfast every morning in the dining room or in the garden at Le Mirage. A range of restaurants and a grocery store can be found within 200 metres of the property.

This hotel is a 30-minute drive from Arles and 4 km from Pont de Gau Ornithological Park. Free public parking is available on site.
address: BP 29 - 14 Rue Camille Pelletan, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Hotel Mas des Lys is situated in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Camargues region, a 30-minute drive from Arles. It offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned guest rooms with a private terrace.

The guest rooms at Hotel Mas des Lys include a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a wardrobe. They each feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning and drinks can be enjoyed in the hotel bar. Restaurants are found within 2 km of the hotel and free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas.

Free private parking is provided and guests can rent bicycles and go horseback riding on site. The property is a 45-minute drive from Nîmes and a 50-minute drive from Montpellier.
address: Route D'arles D570, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Lou Marquès is located in Les Saintes Maries De La Mer, in Camargue Regional Nature Park.  It offers free WiFi and a sunny terrace and it is just 400 metres from the beaches.

All the air-conditioned rooms at Lou Marquès come with an LCD TV and a telephone. They all have a private bathroom with a shower and some of them also include a private terrace.

You may have your breakfast served in the communal lounge or take it on the terrace. You can ask the reception about the nearest restaurants.

Free public parking is available on site and the hotel is a 5-minute drive from Pont de Gau Ornithological Park. Arles is a 30-minute drive away.
address: 6 Rue du Vibre, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Just 100 metres from the nearest beach and 400 metres from the church in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, this 3-star hotel offers free WiFi access throughout the property. It is 35-minute drive from Arles and a thalassotherapy centre can be found nearby.

The rooms at Hôtel Les Arcades feature an LCD TV. a work desk and a mosquito net. Some rooms are air-conditioned and all have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. You can also enjoy one of the bar’s selection of soft drinks on the terrace.

Le Grau-du-Roi is a 45-minute drive from Les Arcades and Nîmes is 45 km away. Guests can explore the coastline and the Camargue Natural Regional Park. Free public parking is available 50 metres from the property and there is a space in front of the hotel where guests can park to unload their car.
address: 5, rue Paul Hermann, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Auberge de la Fadaise is located in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the heart of the Camargue region, a 5-minute drive from the beach. It boasts an outdoor pool and guests can enjoy horse-riding on-site and around Camargue upon reservation.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some have a view of the pool, and some have a balcony. Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A continental breakfast is available daily for an extra fee. Homemade meals and local specialities can be prepared by the hosts upon reservation. Sandwiches, drinks and ice creams are available for an extra charge throughout the day.

With free private parking on site, the hotel is 5 km from Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer and a 20-minute drive from Aigues-Mortes. The Pont de Gau Ornithological Park is located 200 m from the hotel
address: Route d'Arles - Quartier du Pont de Gau  D570, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Vila De La Mar & Spa is a small hotel featuring modern design located in the centre of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 100 metres from the beach. There is a heated outdoor swimming pool, covered during winter, and a spa with hammam and hot tub.

Each air-conditioned room features a private terrace, a minibar and a large flat-screen TV with cable channels.

Guests can enjoy a  restaurant with a terrace overlooking the pool. On some weekends a dinner hosted by Gypsy guitarists and singers can be provided for a surcharge. A continental breakfast is also available and in-room breakfast is possible for a surcharge.

Activities in the area include windsurfing, horse riding and boat excursions. Vila De La Mar & Spa is surrounded by the Camargue Regional Nature Park and faces the Mediterranean Sea. Guests can also enjoy four wheel, bicycle or carriage rides during their stay.

The property is within 60 km from both Nîmes and Garons Airports, and 120 km from Marseille Marignane Airport. Arles Train Station is 36 km away.
address: 1 bis rue Camille Pelletan, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
The hotel La Palunette is located 1.1 km from the beach in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer. It has an outdoor swimming pool. Each guest room has a private terrace and panoramic views of the Launes Lake.

Each guest room at the Palunette has contemporary decor and a TV and a private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

Guests can relax in the private wellness area which has a hot tub . In summer, guests can sample a locally produced apricot juice whilst in the winter, they can relax by the fire in the lounge.

Montpellier is 55 km from the hotel and Arles can be reached in 30 minutes by car.
address: Route d' Arles, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Featuring a terrace, Hôtel Le Neptune en Camargue is located in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, 400 metres from Arenas Beach and 500 metres from Amphora Beach. Featuring a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. Hôtel Le Neptune en Camargue provides certain rooms with city views, and each room is fitted with a coffee machine. Guest rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Crin Blanc Beach is 500 metres from Hôtel Le Neptune en Camargue, while Arles Amphitheatre is 39 km away. Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 41 km from the property.
address: 14 Rue Jean Aicard, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Set in Saintes-Marie- de-la-Mer, Hôtel du Pont Blanc sits in a flowery garden with terrace and swimming pool, just an 8-minute walk from the beach. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are provided.

The hotel’s rooms feature a terrace with garden views and a flat-screen TV. They all have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries, hairdryer and bathtub.

Every morning, a continental breakfast is served at the hotel at an extra cost. Throughout the day, you can find your little quiet corner in our garden. A little reading break? A little nap in the shade of our pines? Let yourself be tempted. A range of restaurants are to be found a 5-minute walk away.

Saintes-Marie- de-la-Mer city centre is just a 5-minute walk away. Guests can drive 25 km to Aigues-Mortes or 34 km to Le-Grau-du-Roi.  Arles Train Station is 35 km away.
address: Chemin du Pont Blanc, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

hotel_name: Logis Le Nid du Pont de Gau
text_description:
In this unspoiled natural setting of the Camargue, Le Nid du Pont de Gau offers you a warm welcome in its cozy accommodation.
Located 4 km from the village of Saintes Maries de la Mer and just 2 steps from the ornithological park, our family and friendly establishment is located in the middle of birds and ponds.

Just like at home, you will appreciate the comfort of our fully equipped apartments with a natural and relaxing atmosphere.
For an unusual and unforgettable stay, our Gypsy Caravan "Ginès" offers an atypical and colorful space with all mod cons where you will feel like a traveler.

You can enjoy our landscaped garden during the day in the shade of the fig trees and in the evening while admiring the flight of pink flamingos.
After your getaways, you will be delighted to refresh yourself on the terrace of our café around a local drink, a snack or an ice cream in a friendly atmosphere.

During your stay, we invite you to rest and relax as well as to explore our beautiful Camargue.
We love our region and our traditions. We are present and available if you want advice, we will be happy to share our good addresses and tips.
address: Route d'Arles- RD 570, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Mangio Fango Hotel et Spa in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer has 4-star accommodation with a garden, a terrace and a bar. Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, this property is located near attractions such as Eglise des Stes Maries. There is a restaurant.

Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. All guest rooms at Mangio Fango Hotel et Spa have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms come with a balcony.

The accommodation offers a buffet breakfast. The restaurant is open every day except on Tuesday and Wednesday.

The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 33 km from Mangio Fango Hotel et Spa.
address: Route d'Arles D570, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

text_description:
Located just 400 metres from the sandy beach in Saintes-Maries-de-La-Mer, Le Maset en Camargue is an air-conditioned hotel offering a swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers. Free WiFi is provided in the guest rooms.

Featuring a classic décor with tiled flooring, each of the rooms features a terrace and an LCD TV. The en suite bathrooms include a walk-in shower.

A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning at Le Maset en Camargue, and breakfast can also be taken in your room.

Many restaurants and shops can be found within a 10-minute walk.

Leisure activities include horse riding, cycling and hiking in the surrounding area and Arles is located 35 km away. Free private parking is available on site.
address: 13 chemin du Pont Blanc, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France

hotel_name: Mas de la Grenouillère Hôtel et Centre équestre en pleine nature
text_description:
Welcome to Mas de la Grenouillère: Your Ideal Getaway in Camargue!

Nestled in the heart of the Camargue, Mas de la Grenouillère is the perfect place to recharge and create unforgettable memories. We offer a range of warm and comfortable rooms suitable for all types of travelers. Whether you choose our romantic double room, our twin room for friends, or our triple and quadruple rooms for families or groups, each space is designed to provide comfort and tranquility.

Our spa , accessible from the age of 16, is a true haven of peace where you can relax in our jacuzzi while enjoying a moment of serenity. Let yourself be indulged by our revitalizing treatments—perfect for melting away stress and recharging your batteries.

For horse lovers, our equestrian center offers the opportunity for lessons and horseback rides by reservation. Experience moments of connection with these magnificent animals while exploring the beauty of the Camargue landscapes.

Start your day on the right foot with our fabulous organic and Fairtrade breakfast , served every morning. Awaken your taste buds with fresh, delicious products, ideal for kicking off a day of adventures.

Whether you seek relaxation at the spa, a chance to discover the beauty of the Camargue on horseback, or a quality breakfast, Mas de la Grenouillère is your top destination. Book your stay with us now and enjoy an idyllic setting where nature and comfort meet!
address: 571 Chemin Haut des Launes, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
